layout.singingstanza: Let us re -- joice and ex -- ult, And let us give glo -- ry to Him, For the mar -- riage of the Lamb has come, And His wife has made her -- self, Made her -- self read -- y. And it was giv -- en her that she should be clothed in fine li -- nen, Bright and clean; For the fine li -- nen is the righ -- teous -- ness -- es of the saints, of the saints. And he said to me, Write, Bless -- ed are they who are called, Called to the mar -- riage din -- ner of the Lamb. And he said to me, These are the true words of God. And he said to me, These are the true words of God.

lyrics.stanza: Let us rejoice and exult, And let us give glory to Him, For the marriage of the Lamb has come, And His wife has made herself, Made herself ready.
And it was given her that She should be clothed in fine linen, Bright and clean; For the fine linen is The righteousnesses of the saints, of the saints.

And he said to me, Write, Blessed are they who are called, Called to the marriage dinner of the Lamb. And he said to me, These are the true words of God. And he said to me, These are the true words of God.
